title: Rodney Reed, Emmett Till, Sister O'dell, Trump and more.
itunes:title: Rodney Reed, Emmett Till, Sister O'dell, Trump and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Today "His Flyness" has arrived. Sister O'dell is in Botswana saving Africans. Many celebrities including Kim Kardashian are asking to stop the execution of Texas death row inmate Rodney Reed. White Supremacists flee the Emmett Till Memorial while filming a propoganda video. Who here is afraid of change? Not Steve! Find out why right here. Trump has harsh criticism for California Governor Newsom. Do men have a problem listening to women while in relationships or nah? Trump welcomes World Series Champions The Nationals to the White House. Today in Closing Remarks, Big Dog talks about letting go and not looking back, plus much more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
